title: Good Omens experience in London
author: British Comedy Guide
comment: Ugh I wish I hadn't missed this!
If I opened a book shelf and davinfld tennant and Michael sheen were behind it sipping on wine, I would callapse and die
description:
The stars of Amazon Prime Video's Good Omens - David Tennant, Michael Sheen and writer Neil Gaiman - surprise unsuspecting fans at a Good Omens themed escape room in Soho. The actors and legendary writer hid behind a secret door to give fans the surprise of their lives. The escape room forms part of a five-floor Good Omens inspired experience and exhibition, open from Friday to Sunday 2nd June to coincide with the premiere of Good Omens on Prime Video on Friday, 31st May.
